name: Gomoku Tic Tac Toe Game <-->
description:
Please note: This app is free, no IAP, cool gameplay and optimized user interaction.

The objective of this game is simple : Connect five of your pieces before your opponent does.

Rules : Black plays first, and players take alternate turns in placing a stone of their color on an empty intersection. The winner is the first player to get an unbroken row of five stones horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Once placed, pieces can not be moved or removed from the board.

Game Features :-

* Awesome gameplay
* Clean UI
* Unlimited undo moves
* Standard 15x15 board
* Nice music and sound effects
* Cool animations
* Play with AI or with your friends
* No IAP, free and much more....

Gomoku is a board game that not only interesting, but also enhance thinking ability and intelligence.

No time limit! Enjoy this classic abstract strategy board game with strong artificial intelligence and cool graphics while having fun...
